{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3654170,"name":"Debbie Bernier","username":"crazycats","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/4af34b/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-06-15T19:59:33.069Z","cooked":"

https://info.firstinspires.org/hubfs/Education_Resources/WorforceDevelopment/ProgramofStudy/Introduction_to_Programming_Course_Outline.pdf

This is a very nice outline of a programming course and clearly it‚Äôs from FIRST based on the URL. However I can‚Äôt find where the course lives.

Does anyone know?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-06-15T19:59:33.069Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":13,"reads":529,"readers_count":528,"score":175.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":503227,"topic_slug":"where-is-this-course","display_username":"Debbie Bernier","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://info.firstinspires.org/hubfs/Education_Resources/WorforceDevelopment/ProgramofStudy/Introduction_to_Programming_Course_Outline.pdf","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":60}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":26700,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/where-is-this-course/503227/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3654175,"name":"Kabir","username":"kn4","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kn4/{size}/235296_2.png","created_at":"2025-06-15T20:07:02.122Z","cooked":"

It is linked to from Career and Technical Education | FIRST. It appears to be an example syllabus:

In the remainder of this guide, you will find resources to develop your own program of study with example courses that teachers, students, and schools can use to implement FIRST into their school or independent learning program. We currently have example syllabi to support the following levels of courses which can be implemented across three different career clusters.

Thanks. That‚Äôs unfortunate. But I appreciate that you found where it came from.

crazycats:

This is a very nice outline of a programming course

I‚Äôm not really sure I agree.

image1910√ó1012 165 KB

How are students supposed to learn inheritance before how they learn how to use objects and methods? Much less, before they know how to use conditionals?

This is bizarre.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-06-15T22:45:36.833Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":341,"readers_count":340,"score":168.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":503227,"topic_slug":"where-is-this-course","display_username":"Eli Barnett","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":6}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12381,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!"},"post_url":"/t/where-is-this-course/503227/4","custom_user_title":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":6}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":6,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3654630,"name":"Tom","username":"Zook","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/zook/{size}/252720_2.png","created_at":"2025-06-16T01:43:03.060Z","cooked":"

Regardless of the sequencing, it is nice to see the linked course descriptions. I know some states have FIRST competitions as an official CTSO* for CTE courses, and having some sort of course outlines is helpful.

*Career & Technical Student Organization membership is a requirement of students completing a Career Technical Education pathway

I‚Äôm assuming that methods and objects would be covered in Java Basics under programming robots section (d) briefly, otherwise learning inheritance would be useless, but its weird that that more in depth is done after inheritance.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-06-16T03:57:03.901Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":191,"readers_count":190,"score":38.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":503227,"topic_slug":"where-is-this-course","display_username":"Arnav Ranjan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":12381,"username":"Oblarg","name":"Eli Barnett","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63253,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"complicated solutions to simple problems"},"post_url":"/t/where-is-this-course/503227/6","custom_user_title":"complicated solutions to simple problems","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3655140,"name":"Chris Gerth","username":"gerthworm","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gerthworm/{size}/268658_2.png","created_at":"2025-06-16T12:14:38.552Z","cooked":"

The time-based/Command-based introduction that early (and, implicitly, teaching it with an understand of inheritence) seems weird to me - I‚Äôd tend to say the teacher picks it up front, teaches the other things as needed, then wraps back around to why the initial choice was made.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-06-16T12:14:38.552Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":145,"readers_count":144,"score":74.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":503227,"topic_slug":"where-is-this-course","display_username":"Chris Gerth","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":12381,"username":"Oblarg","name":"Eli Barnett","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24617,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/where-is-this-course/503227/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3655189,"name":"Eli Barnett","username":"Oblarg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png","created_at":"2025-06-16T13:49:26.204Z","cooked":"

I don‚Äôt understand the ‚Äúdifferentiate between‚Ä¶‚Äù goal at all - surely the purpose of the course is to learn how to program a robot, rather than to learn a taxonomy of robot code architectures?

The longer I stare at the curriculum, the worse it gets.
